name: rnd-ai-management-monorepo
description: R&D AI Management - Monorepo with Web and AI services

scripts.clean-all: rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist node_modules .next dist .cache .turbo .vite coverage .nyc_output .pytest_cache __pycache__ *.log .DS_Store npm-debug.log* yarn-debug.log* yarn-error.log* pnpm-debug.log* lerna-debug.log* .pnpm-debug.log* .vercel .netlify .wrangler .sst .output .tmp .temp .swc .parcel-cache .eslintcache && npm cache clean --force && find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete && find . -name '.DS_Store' -delete && find . -name 'Thumbs.db' -delete && echo 'âœ… All cache, build artifacts, and temporary files have been removed aggressively! Environment files preserved.'
